images.description: PanSTARRS image of region near lenticular galaxy NGC 7759 and its probable companion, PGC 72499 (sometimes called NGC 7759A); also shown are NGC 7754, PGC 72509 (sometimes called NGC 7754A) and PGC 196755
PanSTARRS image of lenticular galaxy NGC 7759, also showing its probable companion PGC 72499, also known as NGC 7759A
PanSTARRS image of lenticular galaxy NGC 7759, also showing part of its probable companion PGC 72499, also known as NGC 7759A
